AllowedObjectTypesConf.description: Restricts the set of allowed object types.

AmbiguousStatementConf.description: Checks for ambiguity between deleting from internal and database table

CheckTransformationExistsConf.description: Checks that used XSLT transformations exist.

ClassAttributeNamesConf.description: Allows you to enforce a pattern, such as a prefix, for class variable names.

instance.description: The pattern for instance variable names

statics.description: The pattern for static variable names

CloudTypesConf.description: Checks that the package does not contain any object types unsupported in cloud ABAP.

ColonMissingSpaceConf.description: Checks for missing spaces after colons in chained statements.

CommentedCodeConf.description: Detects usage of commented out code.

ConstructorVisibilityPublicConf.description: Constructor must be placed in the public section, even if the class is not CREATE PUBLIC.

ContainsTabConf.description: Checks for usage of tabs (enable to enforce spaces).

DefinitionsTopConf.description: Checks that definitions are placed at the beginning of methods.

DescriptionEmptyConf.description: Ensures descriptions in class metadata exist.

DoubleSpaceConf.description: Checks that only a single space follows certain common statements.

EmptyLineinStatementConf.description: Checks that statements do not contain empty lines.

EmptyStatementConf.description: Checks for empty statements (an empty statement is a single dot)

EmptyStructureConf.description: Checks that the code does not contain empty blocks.

ExitOrCheckConf.description: Detects usages of EXIT or CHECK statements outside of loops.

ExportingConf.description: Detects EXPORTING statements which can be omitted.

FormTablesObsoleteConf.description: Checks for TABLES parameters in forms.

FunctionalWritingConf.description: Detects usage of call method when functional style calls can be used.

GlobalClassConf.description: Checks related to names of global classes. For the name pattern, see rule object_naming

IfInIfConf.description: Detects nested ifs which can be refactored to a single condition using AND.

ImplementMethodsConf.description: Chekcs for abstract methods which need implementing.

InStatementIndentationConf.description:
Checks alignment within block statement declarations which span multiple lines, such as multiple conditions in IF statements.
Example:
IF 1 = 1 AND
  2 = 2.

InlineDataOldVersionsConf.description: Checks for inline data declarations in older releases.

KeywordsUpperConf.description: Detects keywords which are not uppercased.

LineLengthConf.description: Detects lines exceeding the provided maximum length.

LocalClassNamingConf.description: Allows you to enforce a pattern, such as a prefix, for local class names.

local.description: The pattern for local class names

test.description: The pattern for local test class names

LocalTestclassLocationConf.description: Chceks that local test classes are placed in the test include.

LocalVariableNamesConf.description: Allows you to enforce a pattern, such as a prefix, for local variables, constants and field symbols.

expectedConstant.description: The pattern for local constant names

expectedData.description: The pattern for local variable names

expectedFS.description: The pattern for field symbol names

MSAGConsistencyConf.description: Checks the validity of messages in message classes

MaxOneStatementConf.description: Chekcks that each line contains only a single statement.

MessageExistsConf.description: In message statements, check that the message class + id exist

MethodLengthConf.description: Chcecks that methods do not exceed the set number of statements

MethodParameterNamesConf.description: Allows you to enforce a pattern, such as a prefix, for method parameter names

ignoreExceptions.description: Ignore parameters in methods of exception classes

ignoreNames.description: The following parameter names will be ignored

MixReturningConf.description: Checks that methods don't have a mixture of returning and exporting/changing parameters

NestingConf.description: Checks for methods exceeding a maximum nesting depth

NoPublicAttributesConf.description: Checks that classes don't contain any public attributes

ObjectNamingConf.description: Allows you to enforce a pattern, such as a prefix, for object names

auth.description: The pattern for authorization object names

clas.description: The pattern for global class names

dtel.description: The pattern for data element names

enqu.description: The pattern for lock object names

fugr.description: The pattern for function group names

intf.description: The pattern for global interface names

msag.description: The pattern for message class names

pinf.description: The pattern for package interface names

tabl.description: The pattern for DDIC table names

ttyp.description: The pattern for DDIC table type names

ObsoleteStatementConf.description: Checks for usages of certain obsolete statements

requested.description: Checks for usages of IS REQUESTED

ParserErrorConf.description: Checks for syntax unrecognized by abaplint

RemoveDescriptionsConf.description: Ensures you have no descriptions in metadata of methods, parameters, etc. For class descriptions, see rule description_empty.

SequentialBlankConf.description: Checks that code does not contain more than the configured number of blank lines in a row.

lines.description: The maximum number of allowed blank lines in a row

SevenBitAsciiConf.description: Only allow characters from the 7bit ASCII set.

ShortCaseConf.description: Checks for CASE statements which have fewer than the specified number of branches

SpaceBeforeColonConf.description: Checks that there are no spaces in front of colons in chained statements.

SpaceBeforeDotConf.description: Checks for extra spaces before dots at the ends of statements .

StartAtTabConf.description: Checks that statements start at tabstops.

SuperclassFinalConf.description: Checks that classes which are inherited from are not declared as FINAL.

TABLEnhancementCategoryConf.description: Checks that tables do not have the enhancement category 'not classified'

UseNewConf.description: Checks for deprecated CREATE OBJECT statements.

WhenOthersLastConf.description: Checks that WHEN OTHERS is placed the last within a CASE statement.

WhitespaceEndConf.description: Checks for redundant whitespace at the end of each line.
